entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Wainwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:03 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.5°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with snow changing to snow and ending late this evening then cloudy. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
